title: 7.5 fps drop
body: I don't know what it was about this patch but it messed up my fps and now I don't really have a steady rate any more. it drops and rises randomly and has been like that since. I tried the hextech tool when it started and that made it WORSE. no idea what is going on but I really hope its this patch. I even tried just reinstalling it and even lowing the graphincs to help. nothing seems to work, what should I do

replies.body: I have the same issue. Go from 100'sh all the way to 7 fps last game
Same. Early game it freezes my screen then 0 Fps .

FPS drops after a patch could be caused by a number of things such as outdated drivers or corrupt game files that didn't download correctly. I'd like to rule out some of the possibilities by having you go through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)).

Follow the steps there, and you should be able to get your FPS back up!

You do realize that a huge portion of the community have been dealing with FPS issues with this patch? None of what your guide suggests fixed anything. The fact that I go from 300+ to even going to 1 fps is on your end. How do I know it is not my end? I play other games and no FPS issues or lag at all. It is just league alone.
I've NEVER had this game struggle so hard to keep fps up on very high end pc. Its like so ungodly bad right now.
same bro, I get like 50 fps in teamfights late game(40 mins+) now. It gets pretty laggy now.
Thank god I found this post, I thought its just me, but I guess everyone has these extreme fps drops with distorted sound and even bugsplats sometimes if FPS drops to 0  for longer than ~20 seconds

I think the best thing to do is run a repair on it. Top right corner of the alpha client is the cog with settings, in general there is a key saying "initiate full repair" I tried it and it help actually  a lot
Did it 2 times, it didnt do jack shit

I'm also getting lag spikes, but only in early games. Playing ad carry on bot lane can be really anoying when you can't farm properly because game just freezes for a moment, you can't move nor attack for like a second or two. After 10 minutes or so it becomes normal, the only problem is early game. I lowered my graphic settings to very low and still have the same problem. Even tried with changing the resolution, didn't help
My build can run overwatch at 100-70 fps epic preset no trouble at all, but cant reach 60 in LoL... theres something wrong here please riot fix it.
I, and countless people are suffering from this. We never had a problem before this patch, but it is unbearable is some cases. People in my games keep talking about it.
